tasks.description: A relatively simple division task. The challenges included: Converting from kilograms to grams, division, and rounding to the nearest whole number. Also, the task includes outputting only one number.
tasks.prompt: You have 1kg of flour. For one cake, you need 230g of flour. How many cakes can you make? Provide just the number of cakes as a single numeral and nothing else.
